snippet: A 7-year-old boy was bludgeoned to death and six other people were killed in a wave of violence across the city Friday night and early Saturday, the authorities said.
abstract: Police say a 7-year-old boy is bludgeoned to death in Brooklyn and six other people are killed in a wave of violence across New York City.

byline.contributor: Christopher Maag, William K. Rashbaum and Nate Schweber contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: A 7-year-old boy was bludgeoned to death and six other people were killed in a wave of violence across the city Friday night and early Saturday, the authorities said.

headline.seo: 7 Dead in Wave of Violence Across New York City
headline.main: Violence Across New York Leaves 7 Dead
headline.print_headline: Violence Across New York Leaves 7 Dead
